title: Trolls in Ranked
body:
So far 2/4 %50 of my provisional games have had intentional feeders/trolls. One such individual had apparently been in 3 games prior and trolled the same according to a team mate how had played with and against him in previous auto matches. Why was he not banned after the second time. I understand one games reports are not worth a ban but 2 games in a row in provisional ranked? This last individual declared his intention "Orubi: fuk you ferrous, dont order me around you stupid b itch....if i say i will troll this game, I WILL" before the game even started. that quote was in response to me asking him not to troll.
Not only does this hurt my and the other 3 people on our teams final rank it damages the game experience.  I wish riot would take a much more aggressive stand on trolls.

replies.body: yeah, I get called a troll a lot... I'm not sure sure why. {{champion:6}}

There is being called a troll for having a bad game, or picking out of meta pick or whatever, that is just bullshit. Then there is entering a game with the implicit intention on trolling your team - this is strait up unacceptable.
100% agree with that, we should duoq.
